alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 4:57PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 530 PM MST... At 457 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Wittmann. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Surprise, Wittmann, Circle City, Morristown and Lake Pleasant. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 121 and 138. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 20. AZ Route 303 near mile marker 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Northwest Valley
